allow: Bash(cmd /c "del SWERVE_SETUP.md PATHPLANNER_SETUP.md PATHPLANNER_COMPLETE.md ELASTIC_MIGRATION.md TODO.md 2>nul && echo Files removed successfully")
Bash(cmd /c 'powershell -Command ""Remove-Item SWERVE_SETUP.md, PATHPLANNER_SETUP.md, PATHPLANNER_COMPLETE.md, ELASTIC_MIGRATION.md, TODO.md -Force""')
